languages.text: {n}Удар начисто переламывает руку сервитора в суставе. Конечность с сухим стуком падает на пол, но получеловек-полумашина не замечает этого: потыкав культей в воздухе, она замирает на месте.{/n}
{n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Удар начисто переламывает руку сервитора в суставе. Конечность с сухим стуком падает на пол, но получеловек-полумашина не замечает этого: потыкав культей в воздухе, она замирает на месте.{/n}

{n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛地一击，干净利落地将它的手臂拆了下来。机仆的胳膊掉在了地上，但它并没有注意到。它只是用残肢戳了戳空气，之后便一动不动了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛地一击，干净利落地将它的手臂拆了下来。奴工的胳膊掉在了地上，但它并没有注意到。它只是用残肢戳了戳空气，之后便一动不动了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El golpe cercena el brazo del servidor en la articulación. Aunque el brazo cae al suelo, el servidor no se da cuenta. Mueve el muñón, atravesando el aire, y después queda inmóvil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El golpe cercena el brazo del servidor en la articulación. Aunque el brazo cae al suelo, el servidor no se da cuenta. Mueve el muñón, atravesando el aire, y después queda inmóvil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その一発で、サーヴィターの腕は接続部わからきれいに折れる。腕は床に落ちたが、サーヴィターはその事態に気づかない…腕は切断部分で宙にくるくる円を描き、動かなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その一発で、サーヴィターの腕は接続部わからきれいに折れる。腕は床に落ちたが、サーヴィターはその事態に気づかない…腕は切断部分で宙にくるくる円を描き、動かなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Schlag trennt den Arm des Servitors sauber am Gelenk ab. Der Arm fällt zu Boden, aber der Servitor bemerkt es gar nicht – er schlägt mit dem Stumpf in die Luft und erstarrt dann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schlag trennt den Arm des Servitors sauber am Gelenk ab. Der Arm fällt zu Boden, aber der Servitor bemerkt es gar nicht – er schlägt mit dem Stumpf in die Luft und erstarrt dann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le coup arrache le bras du servitor au niveau de l'articulation. Le membre coupé tombe au sol sans que le servitor semble remarquer sa perte, comme en témoignent les gestes dans le vide qu'il porte avec son moignon avant de s'immobiliser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le coup arrache le bras du servitor au niveau de l'articulation. Le membre coupé tombe au sol sans que le servitor semble remarquer sa perte, comme en témoignent les gestes dans le vide qu'il porte avec son moignon avant de s'immobiliser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Darbe, hizmetörün kolunu ekleminden temiz bir şekilde koparıyor. Kol yere düşmekle birlikte hizmetör fark etmiyor, kolunun köküyle havayı dürtüp hareketsiz kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow breaks off the servitor's arm cleanly at the joint. The arm falls to the floor, but the servitor does not notice — it pokes the air with its stump, then goes still.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Darbe, servitörün kolunu ekleminden temiz bir şekilde koparıyor. Kol yere düşüyor ama servitör fark etmiyor; kolunun köküyle havayı dürtüyor ve hareketsiz kalıyor.{/n}
